titleStmt.title: Letter, James L. Dodds in France to Ellen Smith in Jackson, Tenn., 1918 May 23

publicationStmt.publisher: The University of Tennessee Libraries Digital Initiatives

availability.p: The copyright interests in this collection remain with the creator. For more information, contact the Special Collections Library.

bibl.title: Letter, James L. Dodds in France to Ellen Smith in Jackson, Tenn., 1918 May 23

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: This is some rainy day here so will write to you. I am feeling fine and hope you are in the best of health. We havent had any mail for most two weeks I dont know what is the matter
I am real anxious to here from some one back home. Some one sent Jnortmelltwo Jaxan Suns and a Memphis paper so we have been reading the news for the last two days
This afternoon we were on our bunks reading. So I got sleepy and went to sleep. just got up in time for supper we have supper at 530 PM and then it is a long time until dark.
It doesnt get dark until about 9 oclock. We moved again yesterday but just a short ways.
We are in a larger town now but a little nearer the front. Well I am in a different job now. I am helping
on a army truck Jno Cortmell and I are together Dont get excited the ink is out of my hinand there isnt any more around.
Say we have a town clock here that stacks just like your little clock on the hand 10-30 and 45 minuts so I told Jno I was going to have it stoped cause it reminded me of you just to murch.
and I am to far away from there to thank of that time ever fifteen minuts.
I dont have to have a clock to remind of you for I thank of you many times ever day and how much I would like to see you.
Now just think if I was at home tonight we could go to the show cause I dont believe it is raining there.
Well I dont know any thing else to write this time. Will do better next time write me when you can and tell me all the news with lots of love
